goal.ch: 本課程欲利用專案導向學習與其他多元方法，期提升學生對流體力學的興趣，並探索自己是否適合流體力學相關的職場。課程當中將透過物理理論教授、 研發工作體驗、飲食品味及職場經驗分享來增進同學對流體力學相關學科的學習動機，也刺激同學思考個人的職涯規劃及學習團隊合作。本課程亦設計多元化評量，包含團體的實務專案成績，希望透過不同角度的流體力學體驗，最終協助科學教育之推動。
goal.en: This course aims to use project-based learning and other diverse methods to enhance students‘ interest in fluid mechanics and explore whether they are suited for careers related to fluid mechanics. The course will employ teaching through physical theories, hands-on research and development experiences, culinary tasting sessions, and sharing of workplace experiences to enhance students‘ motivation in fluid mechanics-related disciplines. It also aims to stimulate students to contemplate their career plans and encourage teamwork. The course includes diverse assessments, such as group project performance, with the goal of promoting scientific education through varied experiences in fluid mechanics.

outline.ch:
1. 生活中各樣流體力學的介紹 (動漫, 甜點, 咖啡, 釀造, 航海, 賽車, 棒球, 生理學, 戰機, 醫療檢測)
2. 預計演講: 戰鬥直升機飛行員, 戰機飛行員, 甜點師, 帆船設計師, 醫療檢測新創公司工程師, 戰機設計工程師.
3. 工程實作競賽: 飛機及船體製作
4. 生活實作競賽: 甜點製作, 咖啡沖煮, 飲料開發
outline.en:
1. Introduction to Various Applications of Fluid Mechanics in Daily Life (Anime, Desserts, Coffee, Brewing, Navigation, Racing, Baseball, Physiology, Fighter Jets, Medical Testing)
2. Planned Talks: Combat Helicopter Pilot, Fighter Pilot, Pastry Chef, Sailboat Designer, Engineer at a Medical Testing Startup, Fighter Jet Design Engineer.
3. Engineering Practical Competition: Aircraft and Ship Hull Construction.
4. Life Skills Practical Competition: Dessert Making, Coffee Brewing, Beverage Development.

textbook.ch:
1. 天文學家的咖啡物理學,  Jonathan Gagné, 方言文化
2. 飛機的構造與飛行原理, 中村寬治, 知的
3. Stephenson, T. (2016). The Curious Bartender‘s Gin Palace. Ryland Peters ＆ Small.
4. 葡萄酒全書, 林裕森, 積木文化
5. Darrigol, O. (2005). Worlds of flow: A history of hydrodynamics from the Bernoullis to Prandtl. Oxford University Press.
textbook.en:
1. Gagné, J. (2020). The physics of filter coffee. Scott Rao.
2. 飛機的構造與飛行原理, 中村寬治, 知的
3. Stephenson, T. (2016). The Curious Bartender‘s Gin Palace. Ryland Peters ＆ Small.
4. 葡萄酒全書, 林裕森, 積木文化
5. Darrigol, O. (2005). Worlds of flow: A history of hydrodynamics from the Bernoullis to Prandtl. Oxford University Press.

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討
實習/實驗

gradMethod.ch: 飛機製作比賽成果 15％、船體製作比賽成果15％、飛機製作分析報告30％、船體製作分析報告30％、個人表現5％及比賽分數5％。
gradMethod.en:
Aircraft Construction Competition Result: 15％
Ship Hull Construction Competition Result: 15％
Aircraft Construction Analysis Report: 30％
Ship Hull Construction Analysis Report: 30％
Personal Performance: 5％
Contest result: 5％

ch.competencies: 運用數學、科學及工程知識之能力
設計、執行實驗及分析之能力
土木工程設計及監造之能力
計畫管理、人際溝通，專業表達與撰寫之能力
團隊合作與整合之能力
主動發掘、分析及解決問題之能力
國際觀、吸收新知以及自我學習之能力
工程技術與生態環境之互動
工程倫理並善盡社會責任，並具有人文素養及服務人群之精神

en.competencies: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing  Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical  Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public
